title: MILCOM 2015 Sets Up In Tampa, Florida, For An Upcoming Major Conference
content:
[SatNews] Now is the time to register for MILCOM 2015 , the premier international conference for Military Communications, October 26-28, at the Tampa Convention Center, Florida. 
 
New in 2015, one tutorial is included with each paid full-conference registration. Capacity is limited and is available on a first-come, first-serve basis. Eighteen topics will be offered, including Software Defined Networking, Cyber Resilience, Mobile Tactical Networks, and more. Follow the link above for details on these sessions. Schedule updates are available online. Visit the Technical Program page or the Technical Panel page for more details 
 
Thirty-eight sessions are now approved for continuing education credit through our academic partners, CompTIA and GIAC. More are constantly added; check the CE flyer for updates. 
 
Members save $200, join or renew today at AFCEA or IEEE . Members also get streamlined attendance documentation of CE credit.
